docs.snippet: LEAD: After the Trade Bill  After nearly three years, the Senate ratified a trade bill last week. The President has vowed to veto the legislation because it contains a provision requiring companies to give 60 days notice before plant closings. But...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: After the Trade Bill After nearly three years, the Senate ratified a trade bill last week. The President has vowed to veto the legislation because it contains a provision requiring companies to give 60 days notice before plant closings. But the bill also gives authority to the President to negotiate at the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade and paves the way for the upcoming vote in Congress on a free trade agreement with Canada.

docs.snippet: LEAD: John McEnroe understood there would be days like this, when he would stumble in his bid to become a dominant player again. On the second point of yesterday's match at Forest Hills against Diego Perez of Uruguay, McEnroe slipped and fell...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: John McEnroe understood there would be days like this, when he would stumble in his bid to become a dominant player again. On the second point of yesterday's match at Forest Hills against Diego Perez of Uruguay, McEnroe slipped and fell following his serve to the net, suffering abrasions on his leg and hand.

headline.main: McEnroe Is Upset By Perez, No. 136

docs.snippet: LEAD: AFTER the tension stirred up by weeks of campaigning and rumors of a coup, Ecuadoreans were understandably relieved that the Presidential election last Sunday proved to be an anticlimax. There was no violence, no cry of fraud, no rumble of...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AFTER the tension stirred up by weeks of campaigning and rumors of a coup, Ecuadoreans were understandably relieved that the Presidential election last Sunday proved to be an anticlimax. There was no violence, no cry of fraud, no rumble of tanks and, above all, no surprise victory for Abdala Bucaram Ortiz, a rabble-rousing populist who had come to personify political instability here.
